an9.15:1.2: Tassassu gandassa nava vanamukhani nava abhedanamukhani.
an9.15:1.4: asuciyeva pagghareyya, duggandhamyeva pagghareyya, jegucchiyamyeva pagghareyya;
an9.15:1.6: asuciyeva pasaveyya, duggandhamyeva pasaveyya, jegucchiyamyeva pasaveyya.
an9.15:2.1: Gandoti kho, bhikkhave, imassetam catumahabhutikassa kayassa adhivacanam matapettikasambhavassa odanakummasupacayassa aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammassa.
an9.15:2.2: Tassassu gandassa nava vanamukhani nava abhedanamukhani.
an9.15:2.4: asuciyeva paggharati, duggandhamyeva paggharati, jegucchiyamyeva paggharati;
an9.15:2.6: asuciyeva pasavati, duggandhamyeva pasavati, jegucchiyamyeva pasavati.
